channel.title: Item Drops - EXPERIENCED CODERS NEEDED!

item.title: Item Drops - EXPERIENCED CODERS NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @anc13nts anc13nts
item.description:
@anc13nts wrote:

here i will fix the thing for ur

// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;
public class itemspawnpoints
{
public int spawntimer = 30;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 30)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3066, 3952, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3253, 3462, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3096, 3956, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3259, 3433, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3194, 3424, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(2339, 2760, 3481, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Leaf For Invisible Armour Quest
ItemHandler.addItem(1944, 3229, 3299, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Egg
ItemHandler.addItem(2166, 3260, 3437, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Gnomebowl mould
ItemHandler.addItem(793, 2588, 3091, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Daconia Rock For Spells Of The Gods Quest
ItemHandler.addItem(1917, 3252, 3439, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Light beer
ItemHandler.addItem(1359, 3222, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // rune axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6821, 2856, 3492, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // rune axe
ItemHandler.addItem(2945, 3256, 3382, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // rune axe

ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2316, 9813, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2309, 9813, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2315, 9829, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2328, 9826, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // ectotoken

ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 2315, 9834, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 2348, 9865, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9848, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9867, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9819, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // tokku

ItemHandler.addItem(3801, 3269, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController, false); // Keg of beer
spawntimer = 30;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 30;
}
}
//there try that that should work

item.title: Item Drops - EXPERIENCED CODERS NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @Escapez Escapez
item.description:
@Escapez wrote:

the timer is spawntimer

what the logic here in this code is saying is:
init the timer to 0, then when the timer is less than or equal to 1 then make your items and set the timer to 60. I’m going to deduct the timer gradually by 1 from 60 (thats what the function process() does).

you can either set the timer “spawntimer” less than 60 if you want items to be spawn faster or find out what timer handles how long the item will last on the floor before it disappears and change that.

Read full topic

item.title: Item Drops - EXPERIENCED CODERS NEEDED!
item.dc:creator: @kexion kexion
item.description:
@kexion wrote:

hello, im using hiyascape as my servers source.

i have item spawns in locations, and sometimes they will spawn for a second or two then disappear. Ive been trying to get the problem fixed for a while now, but i dont know what to do… please help me.

here is my code for itemspawnpoints.java

// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez import java.io.*; public class itemspawnpoints { public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems()
{
for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++){
if(spawntimer <= 1)
{
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3066, 3952, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3253, 3462, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(347, 3096, 3956, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // herring
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3259, 3433, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(1351, 3194, 3424, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // bronze axe
ItemHandler.addItem(2339, 2760, 3481, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Leaf For Invisible Armour Quest
ItemHandler.addItem(1944, 3229, 3299, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Egg
ItemHandler.addItem(2166, 3260, 3437, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Gnomebowl mould
ItemHandler.addItem(793, 2588, 3091, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Daconia Rock For Spells Of The Gods Quest
ItemHandler.addItem(1917, 3252, 3439, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Light beer
ItemHandler.addItem(1359, 3222, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // rune axe
ItemHandler.addItem(6821, 2856, 3492, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // rune axe
ItemHandler.addItem(2945, 3256, 3382, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // rune axe

ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2316, 9813, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2309, 9813, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2315, 9829, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // ectotoken
ItemHandler.addItem(4278, 2328, 9826, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // ectotoken

ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 2315, 9834, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 2348, 9865, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9848, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9867, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tokku
ItemHandler.addItem(6529, 9819, 6529, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // tokku

ItemHandler.addItem(3801, 3269, 3434, 1, ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Keg of beer
spawntimer = 60;
}
}
}

public void process()
{
LoadItems();
spawntimer -= 1;
}
}

thanks so much to who ever helps.
